description: Detects renamed ftp.exe, ftp.exe script execution and child processes ran by ftp.exe Author: Victor Sergeev, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious ftp.exe
query: ((process.command_line:*\-s\:* AND (process.executable:*ftp.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*ftp.exe*)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*ftp.exe* AND (NOT (process.executable:*ftp.exe))) OR process.parent.executable:*ftp.exe)
